summary: Wong Fei-Hung (Jackie Chan) is a mischievous, yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents, his frustrated father has him disciplined by Beggar So (Siu-Tin Yuen), a Master of drunken martial arts.
cast: Jackie Chan|Siu-Tin Yuen|Jang-Lee Hwang|Dean Shek|Kau Lam|Linda Lin|Tien Lung Chen|Hsia Hsu|Chiu-Jun Lee|Han Chen Wang|Kwai Shan|Chin Chiang|Shun-Yee Yuen|Ging-Man Fung|Hui Tsai|Shao-Hung Chan|Tin Shing Hoh|Ha Huang|Chun Hua Li|Ying Li|Tieh-Cheng Lin|Chiang Lo|Bo Tam|Jing Tang|Chi-Ming Wong|Brandy Yuen|Woo-Ping Yuen
keywords: kung fu classic|kung fu master|slapstick comedy|alcohol withdrawal|alcoholism
title: El mono borracho en el ojo del tigre
